title: Crime Alert 07.31.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.31.19
description:
Judge rules that man accused in his wife's death can use the insurance money for his defense. Perv picks the wrong woman to flash. Man says he dismembered his dad because he panicked after he died.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
